thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au
thread.title: Peter Parussolo
thread.title_full: Nelson Alexander reviewed by Peter Parussolo

author: Peter Parussolo
title: Peter Parussolo
text:
I have been dealing with Nelson Alexander now for over 15 years and I have always found them to be honest, trustworthy, friendly and professional in their approach.
More specifically, i have no hesitation in recommending them as real estate agents for all your needs.
